comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:

Website or app doesn't work properly

other (specify in comment below)

Desktop

https://www.crkt.com/

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.crkt.com/`

### Issue:
Many images are missing, due to a partially blocked/whitelisted cookie consent.

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`@@||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent`

### Possible fix:
```
- ||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/*/OtAutoBlock.js$important,domain=shop.elsevier.de|otomoto.pl|olx.ro
+ ||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/*/OtAutoBlock.js$important,domain=crkt.com|shop.elsevier.de|otomoto.pl|olx.ro
```

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v113.0.1-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.49.2

issue.body:

issue.title: mtvuutiset.fi

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO 1.49.3rc6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.mtvuutiset.fi/artikkeli/salossa-etsitaan-kadonnutta-vanhusta/8242082#gs.z9vb5z

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cookies for social media will have to accepted, otherwise embedded content won't work. This rule causes the issue: `||cookielaw.org^$third-party`. The GDPR script will have to whitelisted for this site, or a cookie should be created that sets social media cookies as accepted.

(Personally I think that blocking `cookielaw.org` generically might not be a good idea as it will cause breakages on many pages. Specific rule is safer.)

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

Social media cookies not accepted:

![kuva](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/17256841/e7c01774-42e6-44fd-a578-2353a56c46c8)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

Social media cookies are accepted:

![kuva](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/17256841/70a372e8-cfb7-46ea-b17e-9e9861f37229)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Na aszdzienniku i spółce widziałem w jakiś artykułach (jak sprawdzałem czy potrzebuję dziwnych reguł na ukrycie linków do sociali i zamienili drastycznie layout). Pewnie trzeba by czekać na oficjalne zgłoszenie by nie przeczytać tam pół serwisu.

Sam się jedynie zastanawiam czy skryptlet jest warty dodania szerzej do PAF, gdy nie mam zgłoszeń błędów dla prostej reguły CSS 2.1 z potencjalnie mniejszą szansą zablokowania akcji JS strony (zakładając że zawsze jest ta zmienna dostępna dla `set-constant`).

comment.body:
This issue can be relevant to this bug:  https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2311
Which is why the js rule does not work in iframe on space.com
As a temporary solution I can suggest these rules, but as far as I know the embedded videos will not load without accepting the necessary cookies:
```
space.com#$?#div[id^="sp_message_container_"] { display: none !important; }
space.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; position: inherit !important; }
```
You can also use the chrome browser with the AdGuard extension, as there is no such issue.

comment.body:
It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable it or add this rule:
```adblock
docs.mapbox.com#@$#.is-dockedTop, .js-metabar, nav:not(.collectionHeader-nav) { position: absolute !important; transform: translateY(0) !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
> > [https://usyo.net/i/trt/index.php?id_type=a&id_uranai=54をブロックするために、](https://usyo.net/i/trt/index.php?id_type=a&id_uranai=54%E3%82%92%E3%83%96%E3%83%AD%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E3%81%9F%E3%82%81%E3%81%AB%E3%80%81)
> > ||[https://usyo.net/i/trt/index.php?id_type=a&id_uranai=54^や、](https://usyo.net/i/trt/index.php?id_type=a&id_uranai=54%5E%E3%82%84%E3%80%81)
> > ||[https://usyo.net/i/trt/a_54.html.com^とユーザールールに登録しても、ブロックされていない](https://usyo.net/i/trt/a_54.html.com%5E%E3%81%A8%E3%83%A6%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B6%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E3%81%AB%E7%99%BB%E9%8C%B2%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%82%82%E3%80%81%E3%83%96%E3%83%AD%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF%E3%81%95%E3%82%8C%E3%81%A6%E3%81%84%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84)
> 


文法が間違っています。この特定のページ（のみ）をブロックしたいのであれば、
`||usyo.net/i/trt/index.php?id_type=a&id_uranai=54$document`
`usyo.net`のサイト全体をブロックしたいのであれば
`||usyo.net^$document`
としてください。https://adguard.com/kb/ja/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/をよくお読みください。

comment.body:
@AdamWr:

> `xboxplay.games##div[style^="width: 100%; height:"]`

This completely breaks some articles!

Example:
`https://xboxplay.games/tears-of-the-kingdom/how-to-fix-cant-summon-here-in-zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom-40772/`

Possible fix?:
```
- xboxplay.games##div[style^="width: 100%; height:"]

+ xboxplay.games##[data-aa-adunit]:upward(1)
+ xboxplay.games##div[style^="width: 100%; height:"]:has-text(advertisement)
```

issue.title: Maintenance of AnnoyancesFilter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some rules are duplicate.

### Proposed solution

### cookies_specific.txt
```
###privacyAlert
###shop.disable::after
##.lightbox--cookie-consent
##.modal--cookie
##.sp-overlay
#$##PrivacyCategoryAlert { display: none !important; }
#$##cc--main { display: none !important; }
#$##cliSettingsPopup { display: none !important; }
#$#.cli-modal-backdrop { display: none !important; }
#$#.cli-barmodal-open { overflow: auto !important; }
```
### mobile-app_specific.txt
```
###body-fixed-footer
###branch-banner-iframe
```

### popups_specific.txt
```
##.jumpstart-player-sticky
##.jw-flag-floating > div.jw-wrapper
##.mask-laye-box
##.sign-in-box
##.modaal-overlay
##.popup-wrap
##.simplemodal-container
##.simplemodal-overlay
##.snp-overlay
###steady-floating-button-wrapper
###telegramModal
###NostoOverlay
#$#.modal-open { overflow: visible !important; }
#$##shopify-section-newsletter-popup { display: none !important; }
#$#.modal-backdrop { display: none!important; }
#$#body { overflow: visible!important; }
#$##modal-ads { display: none!important; }
```

### push-notifications_specific.txt
```
##.notice--enablePush
```


### subscriptions_specific.txt
```
##.article-afterbody
###soft-reg-wall-piano-id
###newsletter-signup-short-form
```

Is this now `tuber-ch.com/static/img/belta.png`? If so, I don't think it should be default-blocked. May possibly be annoyance, but only if we get real user complaint. But we can add removeparam rules
```
||belta.co.jp^$removeparam=cid
||belta.co.jp^$removeparam=urrad
```
(not sure about `p` parameter)

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Insults, spread rumors;
- [x] Damage to the reputation of others;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

Block bad website “sharecuts.cn”

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151551

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

https://sharecuts.cn/post/4344

There are insults, spread rumors, damage to the reputation of others,
and a large number of other bad content on this website.See the issue.

I sincerely hope that the Adguard team will support justice and approve and merge this PR to protect the rights of users.😁

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_0151](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/85857425/8a016d09-a0d5-4eae-a9d4-a702778b17d3)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: onual.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://onual.com/forum/showthread.php?tid=19306](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonual.com%2Fforum%2Fshowthread.php%3Ftid%3D19306) ### Comment Username: @szolnok7 > 4-5 gün önce AgGuard mobil deneme üyeliğini başlattım. Sitenizde tavsiye edilen bütün ayarlamaların doğru olduğuna eminim, ancak hiç bir reklam engellenmiyor. URL olarak verdiğim sadece bir örnek. Bilgisayarımda da AdGuard kullanıyorum. Aynı sitelerdeki reklamları engelliyor, ancak Safari kullanırken AdGuard Mobil versiyonu hiç bir reklamı engellemiyor. Deneme üyeliğim 2 gün sonra bitiyor. Deneme üyeliğim bitmeden sizlerden çözüm beklemekteyim. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://id.flybuys.com.au/as/34zxL/resume/as/authorization.ping](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fid.flybuys.com.au%2Fas%2F34zxL%2Fresume%2Fas%2Fauthorization.ping) ### Comment Username: @Eugene-Savenko > > 1. pull_request.title: Remove Cloudflare challenge false positive and fix detection of JS error beacons
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

Fixes users being unable to solve Cloudflare's anti-bot challenge pages and widget.
Fixes incomplete JS error beacon URL.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [X] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

1) Removes Cloudflare Challenge/Turnstile path 

Requests to `/cdn-cgi/challenge-platform/*` on websites behind
Cloudflare are required for challenge pages and Turnstile to work
correctly.

References:
- https://blog.cloudflare.com/turnstile-private-captcha-alternative/
- https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/get-started/reference/cdn-cgi-endpoint/#cdn-cgi-endpoint:~:text=/cdn%2Dcgi/challenge%2Dplatform/

2) Fixes Cloudflare JavaScript error logging URL

This endpoint is used to log JavaScript errors while executing
challenges, but the `g` in the URL can be other values.

### Enter the issue address

None existing.

### Add your comment and screenshots

See comment above.

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

AdGuard Home self hosted ### AdGuard version AGH v0.107.29 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly signalfx.com resolves to 0.0.0.0 ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? signalfx.com ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard DNS filter https://adguardteam.github.io/HostlistsRegistry/assets/filter_1.txt ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots signalfx.com is blocked by AdGuard DNS filter ``` Rule(s) ||signalfx.com^ AdGuard DNS filter Response A: 0.0.0.0 (ttl=10) ``` ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition
